ema dumriya niwaradi sangnya anuwa gaman kala yuthu yayi ohu penwa deyi.dumriya riyaduru sangamaye sabhapathi ayi. el. ke. disanayaka mahatha pawasanne anathurata hethuwa ho anathure wagakiwa yuththan kawurun da yanna srujuwa kiwa nohaki wuwath chinayen aanayanaya kala dumriya madiri ha indiyan balawega dumriyayan sambandhawa athi gatalu sambandhayen thama sangamaya wisin warin wara dumriya departhamenthuwa danuwath kala bawayi.pasugiya kalayedi awastha dekakadi china madiriwala thiringa kriyathmaka nowu pradhana awastha dekak pilibandawa wartha kala bawath ohu penwa deyi.oomanthe sita kolambaa kotuwa bala dhawanaya wu yaldewi dumriye thiringa yeduwath eya galgamuwen kilomitar thunak dura gos nawathuna bawa ohu penwa deyi.

me chanda satana prakashayata pathwimath samanga ejapa dakunu ha basnahira palath sabha manthriwaru kihipa denek, ejapa aasana sanwidhayakawaru pirisak ha ejapaye pradeshiya sabha wipaksha nayakawaru kihipa denek da aandu pakshayata ekwimata sudanamin sitina bawa danagannata atha.me naya yame lakunu penwamin ranil wikramasinha mahatha wisin basnahira palath sabhawata idiripath kirimata yojana karana lada ruwan wijewardhana ha harsha da silwa yana manthriwaru ese idiripath wima da prathikshepa kara atha.ejapaya mema chandayata idiripath kirimata prasiddha charitha soyamin sitiyadi ema pakshaya thula nam prasiddha pudgalayan me dinawala aanduwe dorata thattu karamin sitina bawa aanduwe prabala amathiwarayek ‘silumina'ta kiya.ejapa durwala nayakathwaya illu nayakathwa mandalaya wenuwata nayakayage mandalayak pathkirima ha sirikothata chanal 4 kandayama genwa ganimin pennum kala jathidrohi deshadrohi prathipaththiya ejapaya keෙrahi janatha wishwasaya thawaduratath binda watimata prabala lesa balapa athayi ema pakshayema prabalayek kiya.ejapa dakunu palath sabha manthri maithri gunarathna mahatha pawasuwe me chandayata ejapayen ranil nathnam di. es. senanayaka mahatha idiripath kalath ejapaya thunwani thanata watime awadanamak athiwi thibena bawayi.ranil wikramasinha mahathage hithawathek lesa salakena ejapa dakunu palath sabha manthri krishantha pushpakumara mahathagen (raththaran) silumina kala wimasimakadi kiya sitiye thama idiri sathi dekedi dadi deshapalana thinduwak ganna bawayi.
